text: this is where I like to be um I didn't
expect us to win at all actually cuz
we're you know the newcomers and there's
a lot of uh you know uh kids in the show
and I mean it's a it's a strange show to
give an acting award I mean I think I'm
so proud of this cast and I think it's
welld deserved um I think the work that
these guys are doing is so extraordinary
but um I did not think we were going to
win but I did know that if we did win
I'm very bad at improvisation as the
rest of the cast can tell you so I did
not want to go up there with nothing to
say so I did write this speech and it's
gone through many iterations uh you know
I I've I've had a lot of feelings and
thoughts this last week and I wanted to
express it in some way um that dealt
with uh what we do through our art and
also the craft of acting and I feel like
in our society now um we it's important
to remember that acting is a craft and
that this is a guild and it is something
worth of study and it's something worthy
of hard work and dedication and it's not
about how popular you are it's not about
how many likes you get on things it's
not about um I see some Trends in our
society going a certain way and I think
acting is at least for my life has been
a very important component about
self-expression that is very worthy of a
guild um and so I wanted it the speech
really to be about
that um David here in the back had you
run the speech by your castmates it
sounded like well it looked like Winona
was hearing it for the first time or she
was going to talk did it I didn't see
her reaction they're Priceless go home
and watch it it's
amazing um yeah I actually we were at
dinner the other night and uh it was
Cara and uh the teens and myself and I
was like guys I want to say this kind of
crazy speech like can I run it by you
and Charlie was like no no no you'll
ruin it you'll jinx us and but finally
we beat him into submission and I did do
for them but it even changed last night
based on the protests that are going on
at the airports and and all this stuff
that's going down I started to change it
some more um but they did help me and
they did reassure me that it was an okay
thing to say and that it wasn't
pretentious and you know and that I
could say it so I was very appreciative
of their
feedback thank you
[Applause]
[Music]
guys
[Music]
